text.tspan: Value of 1 tonne of antimonyยน, in constant 1998 US$ per tonne.
Data source: USGS - Historical Statistics for Mineral and Material Commodities (2023)
Note: This data is adjusted for inflation.
1. Antimony: Antimony is a metal that is mixed with others to form alloys to be used in pipes, motors, car parts, and batteries. Itโs also used in the
textile industry, where itโs added to plastics, rubber, and other materials to make them less likely to catch fire.
